Incluya productos lácteos en su alimenta: Include dairy products in your daily diet to strengthen your muscles, bones and teeth.
La leche y los derivados lácteos aportan: Milk and dairy products provide protein and calcium that the body needs; consume them daily.
Los cereales, raíces, tubérculos y pláta: Cereals, roots, tubers and bananas give energy to perform daily activities.
Recuerda que una alimentación saludable,: Remember that healthy eating should include foods from all groups.
Incluya y varíe alimentos ricos en prote: Include and vary foods rich in proteins such as: meats, legumes and eggs. These help the formation and repair of muscles.
Las carnes, leguminosas y huevos contien: Meats, legumes and eggs contain iron and proteins, which contribute to a healthy diet.
Las frutas y verduras son indispensables: Fruits and vegetables are essential for the body. They provide vitamins, minerals and fiber.
Incluya en su alimentación mínimo cinco: Include five servings of fruits and vegetables a day in your diet. Prefer whole fruits.
Mantenga una alimentación saludable, uti: Maintain a healthy diet, using vegetable oil in a moderate amount.
Las grasas vegetales ayudan a que los al: Vegetable fats help foods absorb and retain flavors. Consume them in moderate amount.
El azúcar moreno, miel o panela aportan: Brown sugar, honey or panela provide energy and very few nutrients. Consume them in small quantities.
Consumir alimentos saludables y nutritiv: Eating healthy and nutritious foods helps you to be healthy and vigorous.
Los alimentos aportan los nutrientes nec: The food provides the necessary nutrients for the proper functioning of the organism.
Puede acceder desde su casa o en cualqui: You can access from your home or anywhere. From your computer, go to www.nutrifami.org
En su celular o tableta, descargue Nutri: On your phone or tablet, download Nutrifami from the Google Play Store, Apple Store or Windows Store
